content: Is anyone aware of any white papers or similar documents organizations have created about their use of FHIR or recommendations around FHIR adoption?
Would the IHE profiles for MHD, PIXm & PDQm be helpful or did you have something else in mind (maybe something less technical)?

Not looking for specifications, but more general "when should FHIR be used?", "how should FHIR be used?", pros & cons sorts of stuff. I know there's lots of presentation materials and blog posts and things, I'm just wondering if there are any more official white-paper style documents out there.
also wondering if there are any case study documents. Published Whitepapers of how Fhir was implemented. Would be helpful.
there are some going to posted to fhir.org soon
Will you post here when they're available?
I'll let people know in the social stream
